leonardo-da-vinci-vision.author: Dr. Emily Chen
leonardo-da-vinci-vision.content: Fascinating article! Leonardo's insights into binocular vision were truly groundbreaking for his time.

leonardo-da-vinci-vision.author: Marcus Williams
leonardo-da-vinci-vision.content: As an artist, I've always been amazed by da Vinci's sfumato technique. Now I understand the science behind it!

blue-light-impact.author: Sarah Martinez
blue-light-impact.content: This is exactly what I needed to read! I was about to buy blue light glasses but now I'll save my money.

blue-light-impact.author: Tech Worker
blue-light-impact.content: Great article! The 20-20-20 rule has helped me more than any glasses ever did.

blue-light-impact.author: Dr. James Park
blue-light-impact.content: Well-researched piece. It's important to separate marketing hype from actual science.
